<xen:title>{xen:phrase add_global_field}</xen:title>
<xen:h1>{xen:phrase add_global_field}</xen:h1>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink 'forms/edit', $form}">{$form.title}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<xen:require css="delete_confirmation.css" />
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'forms/add-global-field', $form}" class="formOverlay"> <xen:selectunit label="{xen:phrase global_field}" name="global"> <xen:options source="$preparedGlobals"/> </xen:selectunit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase add_global_field}" />
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase add_template_field}</xen:title>
<xen:h1>{xen:phrase add_template_field}</xen:h1>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink 'forms/edit', $form}">{$form.title}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<xen:require css="delete_confirmation.css" />
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'forms/add-template-field', $form}" class="formOverlay"> <xen:selectunit label="{xen:phrase field_template}" name="template"> <xen:options source="$preparedTemplates"/> </xen:selectunit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase add_template_field}" />
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </xen:form>

{xen:phrase form_permissions}: {$form.title} {xen:phrase permissions}
{xen:phrase private_form} {xen:phrase if_selected_users_only_view_form_if_granted_permissions}

<xen:title>{xen:phrase form_permissions}: {$form.title} - {$user.username}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink 'form-permissions', $form}">{xen:phrase permissions}: {$form.title}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink 'form-permissions', $form}#{xen:helper listitemid, 'user_{$user.user_id}'}">{$user.username}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<xen:require js="js/xenforo/permission.js" /> <xen:require css="permission.css" />
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'form-permissions/user/save', $form}" class="PermissionChoices">
<xen:include template="permission_tooltip"> <xen:set var="$contentPermission">1</xen:set> </xen:include>
<fieldset id="piGroups">
<xen:include template="permission_check_all"> <xen:set var="$target"></xen:set> </xen:include>
<xen:foreach loop="$permissions" key="$permissionGroupId" value="$permissionGroup"> <xen:include template="permission_list_form_group" /> </xen:foreach>
</fieldset>
<input type="hidden" name="user_id" value="{$user.user_id}" />
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase update_permissions}" />
</xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase form_permissions}: {$form.title} - {$userGroup.title}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink form-permissions, $form}">{xen:phrase permissions}: {$form.title}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink form-permissions, $form}#{xen:helper listitemid, 'user_group_{$userGroup.user_group_id}'}">{$userGroup.title}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<xen:require js="js/xenforo/permission.js" /> <xen:require css="permission.css" />
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'form-permissions/user-group/save', $form}" class="PermissionChoices">
<xen:include template="permission_tooltip"> <xen:set var="$contentPermission">1</xen:set> </xen:include>
<fieldset id="piGroups">
<xen:include template="permission_check_all"> <xen:set var="$target">#piGroups</xen:set> </xen:include>
<xen:foreach loop="$permissions" key="$permissionGroupId" value="$permissionGroup"> <xen:include template="permission_list_form_group" /> </xen:foreach>
</fieldset>
<input type="hidden" name="user_group_id" value="{$userGroup.user_group_id}" />
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase update_permissions}" /> </xen:form>
<!--{$permissionGroupId}--> <xen:foreach loop="$permissionGroup" value="$interfaceGroup"> <xen:include template="permission_list_group" /> </xen:foreach>

{xen:phrase required}
{xen:raw $field.editor}

{xen:raw $field.description}

<xen:if is="{$debugMode}"> <xen:require js="js/redactor/redactor.full.js" /> <xen:else /> <xen:require js="js/redactor/redactor.js" /> </xen:if> <xen:require js="js/xenforo/bb_code_edit.js" /> <xen:require css="public:editor_ui.css" />
<script> if (typeof RELANG === 'undefined') { var RELANG = {}; }
RELANG.xf = { image: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase image}}", link: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase link}}", link_insert: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase link}}", unlink: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase unlink}}", quote: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase quote}}", code: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase code}}", bold: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase bold_ctrl_b}}", italic: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase italic_ctrl_i}}", fontcolor: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase text_color}}", unorderedlist: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase unordered_list}}", orderedlist: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase ordered_list}}", outdent: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase outdent}}", indent: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase indent}}", none: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase none}}", align_left: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase align_left}}", align_center: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase align_center}}", align_right: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase align_right}}", deleted: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase strike_through}}", underline: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase underline_ctrl_u}}", alignment: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase alignment}}", undo: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase undo_ctrl_z}}", redo: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase redo_ctrl_y}}", spoiler: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase spoiler}}", insert: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase insert_editor_bb_code}}",
remove_formatting: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase remove_formatting}}", font_size: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase font_size}}", font_family: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase font_family}}", smilies: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase smilies}}", media: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase media}}",
drafts: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase drafts}}", save_draft: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase save_draft}}", delete_draft: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase delete_draft}}", draft_saved: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase draft_saved}}", draft_deleted: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase draft_deleted}}",
switch_mode_bb: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase use_bb_code_editor}}", switch_mode_rich: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase use_rich_text_editor}}",
reply_placeholder: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase reply_placeholder}}",
drop_files_here_to_upload: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase drop_files_here_to_upload}}", uploads_are_not_available: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase uploads_are_not_available}}" }; </script>

option.edit_format_params: delete=Delete Fields and Data convert=Convert Fields to Individual Fields and Preserve Data prevent=Prevent In-Use Global Fields From Being Deleted

phrases.phrase: Enter the short message you would like to show the user when the form is completed.
The conversation sender and recipient cannot be the same.
Custom CSS to be applied to the form.
This is the default value for the field. It will be pre-populated when a user responds to the form.
You cannot redirect to the {name} destination because it is not enabled.
Check this to enable attachments to be uploaded to this destination.
Check this to hide fields that the user did not respond to.
Check this to lock the conversation upon creation to ensure no one else is added.

Enter in the template you wish to use for the form data submitted. You can reference fields by using $fields.fieldname.title and $fields.fieldname.value. (Example: $fields.first_name.title: $fields.first_name.value)
Enter in the user ids for the recipient of this conversation. Multiple user ids can be separated by a comma.

Enter in the user id for the conversation starter. Leave this blank to let this be the submitting user. Note: If the submitting user is a guest, this destination will be skipped entirely. Guests cannot start conversations.
Enter the title for the conversation. You can use {$visitor.username} and {$fields.fieldname.value} options within this section as well.
Check this to enable attachments to be uploaded to this destination.
Format of the email to send.
Check this to hide fields that the user did not respond to.

Enter in the template you wish to use for the form data submitted. You can reference fields by using $fields.fieldname.title and $fields.fieldname.value. (Example: $fields.first_name.title: $fields.first_name.value)
Enter in the email address for the receiving user.
Enter in the e-mail address for the reply to address.
Enter in the email address for the sender. Enter a field id if you want this to be set by the submitting user.
Enter the subject for the email. You can use {$visitor.username} and {$fields.fieldname.value} options within this section as well.
Check this to enable attachments to be uploaded to this destination.
Check this to hide fields that the user did not respond to.

Enter in the template you wish to use for the form data submitted. You can reference fields by using $fields.fieldname.title and $fields.fieldname.value. (Example: $fields.first_name.title: $fields.first_name.value)
Enter in the user id for the creator of this new post. Leave this blank to let this be the submitting user.
Enter in the thread id in which to create this new post in.
Check this to enable attachments to be uploaded to this destination.
Enter in the forum node id in which to create this new thread.
Check this to hide fields that the user did not respond to.
Check this to lock the thread that is created.

Enter in the template you wish to use for the form data submitted. You can reference fields by using $fields.fieldname.title and $fields.fieldname.value. (Example: $fields.first_name.title: $fields.first_name.value)
Question to be displayed on the poll.
Enter in the user id for the creator of this new thread. Leave this blank to let this be the submitting user.
The default thread prefix for threads being created by this destination. Leave blank for no thread prefix.
Check this to sticky this new thread upon creation.
Enter the title of the thread. You may use {$visitor.username} for the submitters username and any other template variables.
There are fields associated with this global field.
This form is no longer available. It stopped accepting responses on {end_date} at {end_time}.
This form is not yet available. It will start accepting responses on {start_date} at {start_time}.
Hide this form from the form list by checking this box.
If entered, the URL to this form will not contain an ID. Use a-z, 0-9, _, and - characters only. Note that once specified, changing this value will cause URLs to be broken.
If selected, users will only be able to view this form if they are explicitly granted permissions.
The license key you entered is invalid for the following reason: {message}. If you are having trouble with your license, please contact LiquidPro Support.
Gee willikers Batman, your license has expired! Call the bat-mobile.

Do what you want, cause a pirate is free,
YOU ARE A PIRATE!
Yar har, fiddle di dee,
Being a pirate is alright to be,
Do what you want cause a pirate is free,
You are a pirate!

Also, your license is invalid :).

Do you like being a bum? Do you like not paying your bills? This is what happens when you don't PAY WHAT YOU OWE! Get em' Johnny!

Might want to handle that suspended license before someone gets hurt...
An attachment is required for this form.
Minimal {min} attachments are required for this form. {uploaded} attachments have been uploaded. Please upload {more} attachments more.
Please confirm you want to clear all responses for this form.
Please enter a datetime in format 2015-04-26 08:00am
Please enter a date in format 2015-04-26
Please enter a time in format 8:00am
Require an attachment to submit the form
If specified, the "Create New Thread" button can be replaced by a button that will direct the user to respond to the specified form.
This is a unique identifier for the field.
User responded to any of the selected forms
Enter the maximum number of responses you will allow for this form. Enter 0 to disable this feature.
Set the maximum number of responses a user can submit.
You have exceeded the number of responses allowed per user for this form.
The maximum number of responses for this form has been reached.
No destinations have been added yet.
No fields have been added yet.
How to handle what happens to in-use global fields.
How to handle what happens to a user's responses when the user is deleted. You can choose to delete the responses by that user, or reassign the responses to "Guest."
Check this option to disable the display of the forms tab on the navigation bar.
Limit the number of forms to show on each page of the forms list.
Set global options for your Simple Forms listing.
This is for internal use only.
When using the rating field, what should the maximum rating be? For example, for ratings of 1-5, specify 5. For ratings of 1-10, specify 10.
How to sort the forms when displayed on the forms listing page.
This is the placeholder for the field. It will appear when the field is blank.
Please confirm that you want to delete the following destination
Please confirm that you want to delete the following field
Please confirm that you want to delete the following form
Please confirm that you want to delete the following response
Please enter a value using {count} characters or more.
The provided file is not a form XML file.
Enter a url the user will be sent to after completion of the form. Leave blank to have them redirected to the forum index or form list depending upon permissions.
The requested form could not be found.
The requested response could not be found.
Set a start and end date for this particular form if you wish to capture entries between particular dates.
No forms have been created yet.
There are no responses for this form yet.
The following is a list of forms available for you to fill out and submit if you have the necessary permissions.
What kind of destination do you want to add?
What kind of field do you want to add?
When selecting the HTML field type, you must enter your HTML as the default value.

modification.description: Add custom CSS for a form
